script:
A dramatic film trailer for a sci-fi thriller.

Structure:
- 0-8s: Quiet, tense intro (instrumental only)
- 8-20s: Building tension with ominous music (instrumental only)
- 20-25s: Musical climax/drop
- 25-30s: Final dramatic line spoken over the aftermath

The only spoken line comes at the end:
NARRATOR: "They thought they were gods... until the sky fell."

Use a composition_plan to structure the music precisely, with the dramatic drop at 20s. Generate the narrator line separately, pad it to start at 25s, then mix over the instrumental track.

voices.speaker: NARRATOR
voices.voice: deep dramatic male voice, gravelly, ominous

music_style: dark cinematic trailer music, tension building, massive brass hits, electronic elements, Hans Zimmer style
